pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analyzing Gene Tree Quartets under the Multi-Species Coalescent // Methods for analyzing and using quartets displayed on a collection of gene trees, primarily to make inferences about the species tree or network under the multi-species coalescent model. These include quartet hypothesis tests for the model, as developed by Mitchell et al. (2019) doi:10.1214/19-EJS1576, the species tree inference routines based on quartet distances of Rhodes (2019) doi:10.1109/TCBB.2019.2917204 and Yourdkhani and Rhodes (2019), and the NANUQ algorithm for inference of level-1 species networks of Allman et al. (2019) arXiv:1905.07050.
